pageTitle: Digital Genres: Digital Art, Electronic Literature, and Computer Games (DIKULT 103, Spring 2011) | ELMCIP
textBeforeTable: Creative works referenced A introductory level BA course taught in the Digital Culture program at the University of Bergen. For each genre section, the course provides three-week introductions to genres of cultural artifacts particular to the network and the computer, specifically computer and network art, electronic literature, and computer games. Students in the course will learn to analyze contemporary digital artifacts on a textual and structural basis, within the general framework of genre studies. antecedents genre games electronic literature digital art Tags:  Not yet reviewed Record Status:  2011 Year:  Digital Genres: Digital Art, Electronic Literature, and Computer Games Web:  University of Bergen, Program in Digital Culture Organization:  Rita Raley
